channel.title: words.zachow.dev
channel.description: Blog about things I find interesting

item.title: How to timeout tests in Go
item.description:
Today I want to share a nice trick I found while inspecting the test file for the bufio in the standard library.

It is about how we can make a test case fail if it take more than X seconds, where X is an arbitrary value we chose.

item.title: How to make a simple Prometheus exporter in Go - Part 1
item.description: In this post I want to show how easy can be to write a custom Prometheus exporter in Go.

item.title: My experience with Gitea
item.description: In this post I want to share my personal experience with the Gitea project. If you don't know Gitea in a self-hosted alternative to Github.

item.title: Youtube channels
item.description: This is a list with some Youtube channels that I like to watch.
